tr.td: Amlodipine (as amlodipine besylate) 2.5 mg oral tablet
1 tablet (2.5 mg) by mouth once daily
1 tablet (25 mg) by mouth once daily
1 tablet (10 mg) by mouth once daily
Clopidogrel (as clopidogrel bisulfate) 75 mg oral tablet
1 tablet (20 mg) by mouth once daily
400 micrograms per spray, use one spray under the tongue as needed for chest pain, repeat every 5 minutes if needed, up to 3 sprays in 15 minutes
Metoprolol tartrate (as metoprolol succinate) 100 mg prolonged-release oral tablet
Influenza virus antigen only vaccine product
Clostridium tetani toxoid antigen adsorbed only vaccine product

ul.li: Maintain hemoglobin A1c below 5.7% to reduce risk of diabetes progression.
Achieve and maintain a 5% reduction in body weight to improve metabolic syndrome and prediabetes.
Maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg to reduce cardiovascular risk.
Maintain LDL cholesterol below 100 mg/dL to reduce cardiovascular risk.
Patient will achieve and maintain target blood pressure through lifestyle education and interventions for hypertension.
Patient will achieve weight reduction as part of lifestyle modification for hypertension management.
Patient will engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity per week to support blood pressure control.
Patient will reduce dietary sodium intake to recommended levels to support blood pressure control.

tr.td: Vaccine product containing only Influenza virus antigen (medicinal product)
Pain severity - 0-10 verbal numeric rating [Score] - Reported
